args:
Aether is after the memories of ruin in the
mana fount. When Pecorine and the others
confront it, the creature absorbs a memory
and grows to an enormous size. The group then
challenges it to battle in order to seal the beast
in the space between worlds.
At the entrance to Memoria Caverns, our heroes\nstand in defense of the mana fount within and\nawait Aether's attack.
Oh, just something I made up to celebrate\nour new awesome friendship.
Oh, you'll never be able to kick butt if you\nget all stiff and awkward before a fight.
C'mon, Lumière! Join in!\nAnd a'one, and a'two...
Lumière Pandora has really taken a shine\nto Pecorine. They're practically like sisters\nnow.
Nazuna was like that when she was little.\nAlways calling me ＂big sis＂ and stuff! ♪
I worry that none of you are taking this\nseriously enough—although I suppose\nbeing on edge will only wear us out.
In that case, I will try to relax by making\ntea and snacks for everyone.
I think the tea's gonna have to wait.
Holy crap! It's an entire horde of fiends!
Aether must have assumed the shape\nof a fiend leader and gathered a herd.
It's going to try and force its way to the\nmana spot through sheer numbers.
We can't let that happen! Yaaah!
Gah! These fiends are everywhere!\nI've lost sight of the others!
Uh oh! I just saw a fiend head deeper\ninto the caverns!
And if that fiend was the transformed\nAether, it means...
Things are about to get nuts.\nI'm going after it!
In the depths of the Memoria Caverns...
This is the mana fount—a repository of\nmemories and information.
SEARCHING MEMORIES OF RUIN...\nSELECTING APPROPRIATE CALAMITY...
Not so fast, fake me!\nOr should I say...Aether!
You transformed into her during that\nperiod where we were separated, yes?\nYou really had us going there for a bit.
But we're done falling for your tricks!
Yeah, we won't let you trash this world!
I did it, Pecorine! I did it!
Nice going, Lumière! I'm impressed!\nNow how about a hug?
I know you're excited, Pecorine,\nbut do try to remain calm.
Yeah, if you give us a hug while you're\nall fired up like this it'll be like putting\nmy bones through a duck press.
Er, you can pet my head again if you like.
I love a girl who knows what she wants.\nCome here, you!
At any rate, I think we're done here—and\nI ALSO think we've earned a nice big meal\nto celebrate!
I WILL BRING RUIN AND CHAOS.\nTHAT IS MY DUTY. MY CALLING.
The caverns are going to collapse!\nEveryone, run! NOW!
Aether transformed into a giant dragon!
The world-destroying form that it\ndrew from the memories of ruin...
Oh no... Were we too late?
No, it's not over yet.\nEveryone, stand back.
Try this otherworld fragment on for size!
Uhh, is it just me or did a big hole just\nopen up in the sky and suck Aether in?\nWhat the heck did you do, Cleo?!
I sealed Aether in the space between\nworlds using an otherworld fragment I\nfound while we were fighting the horde.
But it is, I fear, only a temporary solution;\nit will find its way clear of that place soon.
Which means we must go in to the space\nbetween worlds and defeat it ourselves.
Sounds good to me, gang.\nLet's go save the world!
